name: L2 Ecosystem Unchained: The Future of Web3 Development and Multichain Compatibility
description:
In the rapidly evolving landscape of Web3 and blockchain technology, L2 solutions have emerged as a transformative force, enhancing scalability and efficiency. However, the diverse and non-standardized nature of L2 networks poses unique challenges for developers.

Join us as we unravel the complexities of the multichain environment and navigate the changing terrain of L2 technologies, from diverging pathways to potential convergence. We'll also discuss how these developments influence the Web3 infrastructure and developer toolkit.

speakers.name: Nebojsa Urosevic
speakers.bio: Nebojsa is responsible for the development and maintenance of a custom scalable Ethereum Virtual Machine that can reverse engineer transaction execution and perform various simulations in real-time.
